name: Oh, the Places He Invented! Quiz | Kid Lit Authors L - Z | 5 Questions

questions.explanation:
in Whoville.

	"Little Cindy-Lou Who, who was not more than two" is the heroine of "How the Grinch Stole Christmas!"

questions.text: Where does the Birthday Bird live?
questions.explanation:
in Katroo.

	If you're a Katroovian birthday boy or girl, the kindly Birthday Bird acts as your pamperer-in-chief.

questions.text: Where is Marco when his imagination transforms a horse and wagon into a made-up parade?
questions.explanation:
on Mulberry Street.

	In Dr. Seuss's first book, Marco invents a jubilant parade of circus animals bearing a jolly rajah and pulling an oom-pah band through confetti clouds while a magician sprints alongside, producing rabbit after rabbit.

in a Lerkim.

	The Once-ler (whose face we never see) is the villain in "The Lorax." He has long, snaky green arms.

questions.text: Where is Horton the elephant living when he first "hears a Who"?
questions.explanation:
in the Jungle of Nool.

	The book begins: "On the fifteenth of May, in the Jungle of Nool, in the heat of the day, in the cool of the pool."
